website_summaries.verdict: In spite of being a popular seller by the brand, they come with some issues, which are concerning and make the quality and high-end price questionable.
pros: Though large, these sunglasses earn praise for being lightweight on the face
The frames are contemporary, and the lenses are fashionable and instantly recognizable
cons: Lenses popping out is a common problem
Some consumers voice concerns about authenticity
The large frames may be uncomfortable and ill-fitting on women with small, narrow faces

customer_reviews.title: Lenses pop out
customer_reviews.text: I loved Tom Ford sunglasses. Have owned a few. I really like the feel and look of these. However, The lenses pop out if you touch them or move them in a less than harsh manner. It has happened to me on a few occasions and I have luckily been able to pop them back in. It makes me wonder if I got a fake or if this is how these glasses are made. Personally, I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: sammi johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and sit well on my face. The lens are just the right size without being overwhelming on my face. The arms feel a little stretched when I pull them up over my head to keep my hair back, but otherwise a great purchase. I hate spending a lot on sunglasses but these are reasonable for a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M

customer_reviews.title: Scratches and Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an identical existing pair (because I love these SO much), but arrived with light scratches on the lenses, very disappointing. Would've been perfect had they arrived in good order. Be wary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tom Ford "Whitney"
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL, classy, stylish sunglasses!! The real thing, authentic Tom Ford "Whitney" sunglasses. Packaging is perfect, comes with box, case, cleaning cloth and authenticity card. Made in Italy and all info inscribed on the arms of the sunglasses. Tom Ford logo inscribed on upper left lense. These sunglasses are large but not TOO large. I also love that they don't slide off, they fit nice and snug without being uncomfortable. I have a round face and they look great on me. So happy with this purchase and the seller is professional and awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: happyhappy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Fake Fake Fake!!!!!!! With what you pay for these you’ll be able buy a 20 cheap sunglasses. Disappointed and discouraged buying from Amazon! I’m sure and positively certain these are knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: LoV55

customer_reviews.title: The “Real” Tom Ford Whitney glasses - Belive it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these Tom Ford Whitney glasses. At first I wondered if they were authentic at half the retail price but after receiving order, they are the real Tom Fords same as in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and SO COMFORTABLE. Beautifully made and packaged well. Also, good price especially compared to mall store price, it was almost double! Splurged and not cheap but very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Monica Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: a little big ... but I like them as I have!
customer_reviews.author: eiling bethancourt

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight, felt cheap, returned
customer_reviews.text: For sunglasses that retail for a few hundred $, they neither felt nor looked any more expensive than a $10 pair. They are very light weight plastic. The lenses aren't gradient as I expected and also looked a bit cheap. Another con - I like large glasses, but these were far too big and looked bug-like. Perhaps this is because you can't see through the lenses. The brown may have been a better look since you can see through them so they may not give the bug appearance. I returned these and opted for Jimmy Choo sunglasses instead.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered! These replace the same pair that I had which were stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great oversized sunnies
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. They are perfect for narrow noses and the oversized style really helps block the sun from all sides.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Check other reviews and compare authentic to these
customer_reviews.text: Have authentic Ones and can see w lenses and Tom Ford stamping - they’re close ... but Not authentic - I wouldn’t pay more then $100 for them - They’re a back up pair but don’t pay for the price they’re charging !!!
customer_reviews.author: randi monaco

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical....
customer_reviews.text: so I did my investigation to make sure these are authentic. I googled several articles and watched a great video on youtube plus went to Nordstrom and actually compared them with their tom ford glasses. I was completely comfortable with the fact that I was paying 200.00 less for an authentic pair of Tom Ford sunglasses. Besides saving the money I love how lightweight they are. I have a round face and they look great on that shape. Very very happy with them!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: MORE THAN HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: As an accountant I am a little cautious one might say! With that said, I absolutely love these glasses. I received them a few days ago and have worn them over the weekend for many hours with complete comfort. They are light weight, look great on and come in a soft but pliable case that makes them easy to get in and out of. I would highly and comfortably recommend them . The many accolades from prior reviews helped me alot in my decision to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: i love this sunglasses and bought them 2-3 years ago in ...
customer_reviews.text: i love this sunglasses and bought them 2-3 years ago in the store. i probably paid $350 or so, so i was happy to find them in this price! they are great quality, just be careful - if they fall the glass might snap out, which is easy enough to snap back
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sunglasses at a very good price. Arrived with original case, etc., in a timely fashion
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Tacher

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: I have received numerous compliments on these glasses, at a fraction of the price I would have paid in a department store. They come in the authentic case with cleansing cloth. They are larger than they show in photos, but is perfect for my round (circular) face shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: They break easily- eye piece constantly popping out
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to return to the site they declined return. Called the manufacturer, Tom Ford, they said I had no recourse as the seller was unofficial. Typically they have a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sunglasses, AND you can utilize prescription lenses if needed. That's a MAJOR plus for folks who love fashion, but would also like to SEE! Lots of comments, oohs and ahhs...what more could a girl want?!
customer_reviews.author: D. Caligiuri

customer_reviews.title: They arrived dammaged
customer_reviews.text: The outer part of the right lens is scratched. I bought these for my girlfriend and when I opened the package they where damaged. They are really nice, she loved them, buy I can believe that they would send me a damage item.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Badiola

customer_reviews.title: Tomford Jennifer
customer_reviews.text: My wife owns a pair of this and she loves it.... buying another pair just incase Tomford discontinues selling this model.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Trang

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are incredible. They are authentic and extremely beautiful! Everything about this purchase is perfect. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Omma940104

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife. She lost her first pair in Mexico. She loved them so that the expense of another pair was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Leary

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I've wanted these glasses for about 5 years now, but never got around to it. I finally purchased them, and I am so happy. They fit great and are big (which I like). They came perfectly packaged and just the way I had hoped. Everything was included that should have been. I have no issues or complaints. I'm a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: nice pair!
customer_reviews.text: great shades. fancy and stylish at the same time. great service. prompt delivery. worth money spend. my sister ordered the same pair she loved it so much
customer_reviews.author: L. MAGAKYAN-MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: Thx i like the stuff that i just ordered it was perfect with good quality n the service was amazing n it arrived at the exactly time thx a lot
customer_reviews.author: ahmed al-rowis

customer_reviews.title: If I spend $190 I would like it to look it
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were to big for the case they came in. Case would stay open 2 inches. If I spend $190 I would like it to look it. glasses different than what I expected. Much bigger
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ordway

customer_reviews.title: Tom Ford "Whitney" Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The Tom Ford "Whitney" sunglasses are fabulous. They are sleek and light weight. The lenses are not too dark. Very comfortable. They come with a case and cloth to clean the lenses. Five star!!
customer_reviews.author: Jinkojorg

customer_reviews.title: Love my "Whitneys"
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT trade these glasses for a million buck! They are extremly stylish and comfortable! They also come in a sturdy and lovely brown velevt case!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Tom Ford Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful!! My favorites. They are so comfortable and stylish. This color is perfect especially if you have blonde or highlighted hair.I love them!
customer_reviews.author: agaeto

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic Tom Ford
customer_reviews.text: This is not authentic tom ford sunglasses. I think it's similar enough but it's not real.
customer_reviews.author: Yangge Li

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift, my wife loved it and still loves it, she wears it everyday. The frame looks tough, well made overall.
customer_reviews.author: Franck L.

customer_reviews.title: Look great !
customer_reviews.text: they fit perfect for my face and look great too ! I love it. was worried that , they might be big, but they fit just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: swat

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish, love these sunglasses!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely fabulous!!!!! I love these sunglasses! Very stylish, excellent quality! You will not be disappointed!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bebekittycat

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Pair of Tom Fords!
customer_reviews.text: A little more round-ish than I usually wear, but overall I like. The sunglass holder is white in color and has a suede finish - so it is easily marked up, that is only complaint. A couple pluses: Glasses fit snug against your face and up on top of your head (I own the Miranda style as well - and they are soo loose - they have fell from the top of my head to the ground - scuffing them up in the process...). Also - you can easily pull them up on top of your head and take them off without pulling your hair strands out - unlike some styles with the nose-guard pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Litten

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom Ford sunglasses, especially the Whitney's (his signature sunglasses). Though some people say they feel cheap because they're so lightweight, and the lens is very thin, but they're durable, not to mention stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Houseofbeeres

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. I typically wouldn't purchase glasses over the internet because I like to try them on for a proper fit. These glasses are very light weight and cover your eyebrows while wrapping around the sides of your eyes to block the sun. Worth the money and I would highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Denalyn

customer_reviews.title: ... these sunglasses for about a year now and I love them, they look great on me
customer_reviews.text: Had these sunglasses for about a year now and I love them, they look great on me. The lenses however keep popping out - these sunglasses are far too expense for something like that to happen. I actually lost one of the lenses this past Saturday at an event - VERY DISAPPOINTED with this purchase!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: So glamorous.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? Tom Ford shades are glamorous. These look so good.
customer_reviews.author: HEATH

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Very good sun protection. I have floaters, so these sunglasses help to dissolve them when the sun is not shining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: Theses glasses fit my face perfectly. The frame is lightweight and stays on my nose. I have gotten a lot of compliments. Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. Yes, they are oversized (consider urself warned) but they are beautiful I went with the gradient brown lens. I have another pair of Tom Ford sunglasses and love those too. Well made and worth the money. I have a smaller boned face and these glasses are large for my face but I prefer that look. If you purchase these sunglasses I think you will be very happy. They also offer great sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: So Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at Christmas as a present to myself.... I love these sunglasses! Great light weight fit, simple very classy, not bulky or gaudy looking at all Great lenses, very natural tint so driving is easy in the blazing sun I got them for half the price here, on Amazon- All-in-all great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bonasera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sunglasses! Good quality and very stylish. I get lots of compliments on it:)
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Sunglasses Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses. Bought them quite a while ago, and they are still in great shape. Came with a felt case, and I've been very careful to put them away after each use. Klutz that I am, I have dropped them a couple of times. The first time one of the "lenses" came out, I wanted to cry but then realized it just popped back in! Great purchase. Only sunglasses I ever wear (and I have a lot!)
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Tom Ford whitney dark brown
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new Tom Fords!!!! They are just perfect, very light weight and comfortable as well as stylish! The product came from the seller, authentic with cards, brand new and perfect condition. Came way faster than I expected....received them the following day. Most of all I saved close to $200.00 off retail. So go to your local saks, Bloomies, NM, or nordstrom and try them on, or find the style you like but order them on amazon!!!!! You won't be disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Tom Ford glasses. Fit is perfect and light weight and comfortable enough to wear all day with no nose marks.
customer_reviews.author: Dkimes

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I did my homework through researching and reading the reviews on amazon. All the reviews we're positive, so I decided to take a chance. With Amazon prime, I got them in two days and absolutely LOVE them..they exceeded my expectation nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Lekeshia Frasure

customer_reviews.title: Love my Tom Ford's
customer_reviews.text: I received my Tom Ford's about 2 weeks ago? They are exactly what I expected... So classy!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I own the Whitney in every color. Perfect facial fit. I am petite with a small face and they are stunning. Best sunglasses I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Man Mos

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I Love Tom Ford sunglasses! Love the color and fit! I had a metal pair previously but since I wear my hair up a lot they used to get stuck in my hair! These are awesome! They fit great and don't get stuck in my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Tweed

customer_reviews.title: best, sturdiest, most beautiful, good for small face too.
customer_reviews.text: the headline says it all. i have a small nose bridge so many glasses are too loose. these fit well and hug the head comfortably. i think they would be fine on a bigger nose probably too though because of the design. i am addicted to these beautiful glasses and wear them almost every day. people still comment on them a year and a half later. i lost my first pair and bought another. best sunglasses ever.
customer_reviews.author: cruella deville

customer_reviews.title: Must return
customer_reviews.text: I have a thin face...too large. I must return and order the Jennifer . Love the style of this glasses, but was told they are hard to keep on top of ur head. However, my daughter has them...gets compliments all the time. Very classy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, while I ordered the polarized glass lenses I was delivered the flimsy plastic. So I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: LAHEWO

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I truly question the authenticity of these sunglasses. Tom ford sticker on the box did not match the glasses. The information packet was the wrong color, text. The price seemed too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good product makes a good gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this one for my fiance and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Aranea

customer_reviews.title: Soooo big
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these sunglasses!!! I gave this 5 stars because they ARE cute... they were just too large for my face. I had to return and went with the Jennifer ones... they're a lot smaller. I wish they criss crossed in the front like the Whitneys but I still love them. Thanks for the quick shimpment... I am waiting on the credit, hopefully I'll get it soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dockins

customer_reviews.title: Its ok....
customer_reviews.text: The material and the look of this sunglasses is ok. For $200 you think would get something more decent looking. This should be a $99-$129 pair. Ordered a Tom Ford pair before on Amazon and I loved it. This one is a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Tom Ford Whitney Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I tried these sunglasses on at Bloomingdales, but felt they were too expensive. I saved $150 by ordering through Amazon. They arrived in 3 days. They are gorgeous glasses.
customer_reviews.author: JulieRush

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love
customer_reviews.text: Still fabulous and timeless! I can't say enough about how much I love these amazing sunglasses. My favorite pair by far!
customer_reviews.author: Swarthen

customer_reviews.title: She loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a "just because" gift for my wife .... She loved them .... I am the man ......
customer_reviews.author: reginald washington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful celebrity glasses
customer_reviews.text: A must in your collection if you follow what celebrities wear......These are a favorite of Nicole, Angie, Kim, Jessica Alba ect.....Right color right fit. Very bold & make a statement. If you like a smaller pair of sunglasses don't buy these !!
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting these glasses for a some time and I thought I would check Amazon to see if they had them for less than department price. At Nordstrom, these glasses are close to $400 brand new. This was such a good price, I figured even if they aren't authentic the would be a close copy. To my surprise these are the authentic Tom Ford glasses with authenticity papers and all!!! They came brand new, unwrapped in plastic in the box, as if I had purchased them for retail! Thanks! I love them and would definity encourage anybody to purchase these authentic Tom Ford glasses to anyone who wanted them!!
customer_reviews.author: almetke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly like the pair that i had gotten at Nordstrom for over double the cost (I had lost them). They are brand new and come with all the packaging. Great purchase for me. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my GF. She loved them, but the were so big on her face that they left impressions under her eyes. Keep in mind she thought about it for days but finally agreed to send them back and get something a little smaller
customer_reviews.author: Bronco628

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! Super light, great fit, classy look! Fast shipping and great product and price!
customer_reviews.author: Julia King

customer_reviews.title: I never wanted to splurge on a good pair of sunglasses for myself but I am so ...
customer_reviews.text: I never wanted to splurge on a good pair of sunglasses for myself but I am so glad I did. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fantauzzo

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy
customer_reviews.text: I love my newest "Jackie O" really big sun glasses! Fab quality! Very classy!!! Waiting for prescription lenses to put in them and I"ll be wearing all the time!
customer_reviews.author: jaefp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy, timeless
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are gorgeous. They arrived very quickly. I got them as a gift for my mom. The only concern is that the lens occasionally pops out. It is very easy to get it back in, but I'm not sure if that's supposed to happen.
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sunglasses! Stylish frames and beautiful case. Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.author: Iliana M. Figueroa-Werdal

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are just the correct size for me. It fits 100%. The quality is also very good and it is so sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Lucia sriram

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition. I am glad I ordered them. Definitely pricey, but had to have them. They fit any face type.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but large for small face
customer_reviews.text: It was too big on my face, the glasses are still beautiful. I'm trying the Jennifer style to see if it's a better fit
customer_reviews.author: BuyingUpAmazon

customer_reviews.title: please can i return the glasses they are way to ...
customer_reviews.text: please can i return the glasses they are way to big for my face , i wore them only once and they are very uncomfortable ! Thanks, Bari

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are a bit more oversized than I like, but service and product was/is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ellison

customer_reviews.title: beautiful glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. I saw them at Nordstrom and Sunglass Icon for $395.00! We researched them on amazon and found them here for half off! Overall very happy. The box and case are nice, and they have a good wipe cloth. Just a forewarning; these glasses are huge on your face! I have a round, wider face so I have to buy large glasses, but if you have a small or narrow face they might not fit you well.
customer_reviews.author: gigibird

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses but they ended being too big for my face . The Jennifer sunglasses fit my face a lot better. They are alittle bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kera

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses! These sunglasses also actually block my eyes from the sun and make a difference! The company that sent them to me sent them in such a quick time.
customer_reviews.author: MWallace

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfortable and just dark enough. I would recommend them to everyone. I feel very pulled together with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gianakos

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: I received the Tom Ford sunglasses as expected and advertised. Brand new and authentic. This is the 2nd pairs of sunglasses I orderd from this site. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferV

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been looking for this style sunglasses. It's beautiful. The only thing ihat I wasn't so thrilled about it was the lenses were too dark. Maybe I should have checked out the brown frame and lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are very chic and very, very classy. I just love them. They are light and so stylish, just like everything Tom Ford does. I have pricier sunglasses that have paid full price for them but are not as beautiful as these ones are. Don't hesitate in ordering them as you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use to have one but this one seams stif when I open and close it.
customer_reviews.author: Rc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be a little bigger, but other than that I love'em!! My Tom Fords look and feel amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanieann

customer_reviews.title: Love these and the price
customer_reviews.text: I already had the Jennifer style in black and was looking for a new pair of glasses for a trip. These arrived and were exactly what I wanted and at almost half the price of what I would have paid at a department store. Very excited! Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Great price. However
customer_reviews.text: Great price. However, the lenses pop out easy, but you are able to pop back in. Comes with a great case and an official Tom Ford card. They are a bit loose around my ears, but that's the only complaint I have. Otherwise, everyone loves them and they look fantastic on a heart shaped face!
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these glasses in a local boutique but did not purchase because I felt too pricey. After seeing them on Amazon I was a little skeptical because the price was almost unbelievable. I ordered them all the same; am so happy that I did. I love,love,love these glasses!!!!! Shipping free and in 3 days!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: I loved
customer_reviews.text: Is the best price I found on the market for this sunglasses and I wanted for like a year ago. Arrived sooner than I expected too quickly. The sunglasses are in perfect, new condition and beautiful, the only thing is they did not bring the authenticity paper. I know the sunglasees are authentic is just curios.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: BEST SUNGLASSES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I got these before I went away on vacation and I wasnt sure how they would look on me. Now, Im in love with them and I get compliments all the time on how well they look. They are glamorous and very expensive looking. I dont go anywhere without them. A must have for every fashionista!!
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing and best of all
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. They look amazing and best of all...she love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel J Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Great Shop
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product last week. The glasses are very beautiful and It was delivered in the appropriate time, according with was scheduled. Thanks to EyeWearCountry.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Superb glasses
customer_reviews.text: Superb glasses, fast delivery. Everything came as described. Great price too! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses, but...
customer_reviews.text: The lenses pop out. Easily and often, in fact. And it has done since the month I bought them. The sunglasses look great, but it is disappointing that the lenses pop out whenever the glasses are dropped or accidentally bumped against something. If TF could figure out a mechanism for keeping the lenses in place, these would definitely get five stars!
customer_reviews.author: M Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Today I received my TOM FORD sunglasses but not satisfied my my purchase because sunglasses came used and doesn't looks like new also sunglasses has few scratches on right lens. It was gift for my mom but now I have to find different seller. Also sunglasses box came with some unremovable stickers it's not looks good for gift. May be that why they offered so cheap because is the store price $395 how its possible get for less than $200 I'm not expert but may be it good replica and not new. I will noy buy from Gaffos again.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more for the money, it is a nice design but does not exceed expectations, not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: <3 Tom Ford
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Tom Ford. These are great looking glasses...get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: J. MEYERS

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: great shades, fit nicely, look flawless. tom ford, duh. eleven more words required to qualify to leave a simple review?
customer_reviews.author: Annelisa

customer_reviews.title: Daughter got glasses at Mom's budget
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these sunglasses for Christmas, but they were out of my pricerange/budget. I shopped around and found them on Amazon. Great price, service, and everyone is happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: super savin mom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sunglasses, the only thing I wasn't too happy is that the color in the computer is a lighter brown, still love my sunglasses. I have a round face and they look great. Can't wait to use them in my vacation to the Caribbean.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA LIVOTI

product_meta.title: Tom Ford Authentic Sunglasses: Whitney TF9
product_meta.description: All Tom Ford items are brand new and Authentic. They come complete with a Certificate of Authenticity as well as a protective case and dust cloth. If needed, frames can be adjusted for a comfortable custom fit at any optical store in your area. Frame size is often a personal preference and most frame sizes accommodate the average head.
feature_bullets: Frame/Temple Color: Transparent Dark Brown/Rose Gold - 692
